questions.question: Which of the following best describes how the geography of Nubia changed over time?
What effect did the flooding of the Nile River have on Nubians?

choices.answer: It forced them to leave their homes.
It made it impossible for them to farm.
It allowed them to plant winter crops.
It hurt their ability to produce goods.

questions.question: Which group of Nubian people became leaders in their villages between 3500 BC and 2000 BC?
Which of the following supports the fact that Kushite society grew more complex over time?

choices.answer: The people had lessand less control of their society.
The people began to be confused about their society.
The people relied on the Egyptians to control their society.
The people had a variety of jobs and roles in their society.

questions.question: What conclusion can you draw about the people who participate in trade networks?

choices.answer: They benefited from the trade networks.
They were enslaved by the trade networks.

questions.question: Predict what would have happened if Kushites did not have items to export.

choices.answer: Kushites would have established greater trade networks.
Kushites would have been able to harvest more wood.
Kushites would have invaded places that had what they wanted
Kushites would have been unable to trade for goods.

questions.question: What can you infer from the fact that many buildings in Meroe resembled Egyptian buildings?

choices.answer: The Egyptians constructed better buildings than the Kushites
The Kushites did not know how to construct good buildings.
The Kushite culture was influenced by Egyptian culture.
The Egyptian culture was inferior to the Kushite culture.

questions.question: How did the Kushite dynasty end?

choices.answer: The Assyrians drove the Kushites out of Egypt.
the Nile River flooded their land
Shabaka conquered the capital of Kush.
The kingdom used up all the region's copper and gold.

questions.question: What physical features made travel on the Nile difficult?
What were two influences on ancient Kush?

choices.answer: kingdoms to the south and Egypt

choices.answer: Napata was located along more trade routes.

The resources around the old capital had been used up.
